titleStmt.title: A letter written from His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex vnto the speaker of the House of Commons relating the true state of the late skirmish at Chinner, between a party of the Kings, and Parliaments forces, on Sabbath day the 19th of June, 1643.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Bishop for Lawrence Blaiklock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
